snippet: Professionals like doctors and lawyers and anyone else who might be sued should work with an adviser to keep creditors from cleaning them out if they lose in court.
abstract: Paul Sullivan Wealth Matters column on how professionals like doctors and lawyers, and anyone else who might be sued, should work with an adviser to keep creditors from cleaning them out if they lose in court.
lead_paragraph: Professionals like doctors and lawyers and anyone else who might be sued should work with an adviser to keep creditors from cleaning them out if they lose in court.
